Event # 2 (Cultural Program).title: Event # 2 (Cultural Program)
Event # 2 (Cultural Program).description: A cultural program was organized in our college on February 21, 2022. The program was held on the occasion of International Mother Language Day. On that day a big stage was made in the college playground and a canopy was raised overhead. Hundreds of chairs were arranged in rows for the audience. It was indeed an event of great joy and festivity for the students as well as for the teachers. The program was scheduled to be started at 4 PM. As the day was a national holiday there were no classes on that day. Guardians and students began to gather for the cultural program from 3:30 PM. The function started on time with the recitation from the holy Quran. Our English teacher Mr. Harun anchored the program and our principal
